receive_starred_routes_news_push: Receive Traffic News for Starred Routes
disclaimer_1: 1. All users must agree the following disclaimers when using the app.
disclaimer_2: 2. The raw data on the app are provided by data.gov.hk and Google. Routejam use algorithms to estimate the geolocation and affected routes. The result cannot be guranteed and is for reference only. Routejam dose not responsible for any accidents or damage of any kind incurred.
disclaimer_3: 3. Information relating to the Google Maps is shown on the app for reference only. Routejam makes no warranty that the content is correct.
disclaimer_4: 4. The App collect your current location data for providing nearby route search only. The App does not store your location data in any form.
disclaimer_5: 5. All processed data are the Routejam developerâ€™s property. No modification, copying, publication, transfer, sale, or any commercial exploitation of any kind in whole or in part is permitted.
disclaimer_6: 6. No modification or reverse engineering for the App.
no_service: No scheduled departure at this moment.
subscribled_route_news: Subscribled traffic news for Route No. {}
unsubscribled_route_news: Unsubscribled traffic news for Route No. {}
max_starred_route_reached: You have {} starred routes, please delete unnecessary routes and try again.
no_starred_route_yet_1: No starred route yet. Find the route and press
no_starred_route_yet_2: to save it in this Starred route page. You will receive the related traffic news for the starred routes
unable_to_get_the_location: Unable to get the current location. This page is suspended.
please_rate: If you enjoy using Routejam, give rating on the app store.
cannot_get_location: Cannot get your location, some functions are suspended.
